mvapp.description: Mean of daily vapour pressure for the month. Vapour pressure regulates evaporation rates and water need and use.

mprec.description: This layer approximates the total water inputs and is therefore useful when ascertaining the importance of water availability at specific months throughout the year to a species distribution . Good information for modelling migratory species distributions.

mevap.description: Monthly total class A pan evaporation. Pan evaporation is a measurement that combines or integrates the effects of several climate elements: temperature, humidity, rain fall, drought dispersion, solar radiation, and wind, and is useful for estimating water need and use.

mtmax.description: This information is useful when examining whether species distributions are affected by extreme maximum temperature anomalies throughout particular months in the year. Good information for modelling migratory species distributions.

mtmin.description: This information is useful when examining whether species distributions are affected by mean temperature anomalies throughout particular months in the year. Good information for modelling migratory species distributions.
